aboutUs.hero.title: About EzyMart
aboutUs.hero.subtitle: The goal of Ezy Mart is simple: Ezy Mart is a smart business management platform designed for small and medium-sized stores in Sri Lanka. It allows you to manage your business's invoices, inventory, staff, expenses, suppliers and sales. You can work with it both online and offline. This platform, which integrates an online store with a mobile application, provides a convenient shopping experience for customers, while allowing store owners to take full control of their business.

aboutUs.story.title: Our Story
aboutUs.story.subtitle: How EzyMart came to life
aboutUs.story.content.0: Ezy Mart is a Smart Marketplace built by Vertex Cooperation (PVT) LTD, a team dedicated to creating practical, innovative technology solutions. We aim to make the process as simple, informed and collaborative as possible. As Ezy Mart, our business helps small and medium-sized businesses enter the digital world, connecting consumers and local shops through an intelligent and easy-to-use application. Ezy Mart provides users with a fast and simple way to search for products near them, making shopping more convenient, affordable and efficient, be it home goods, electronics or daily necessities.
